'list[itemId="allItems"]':{itemtap:"itemAdding"},'list[itemId="exclusiveItems"]':{itemtap:"itemAdding"},'list[itemId="cartList"]':{itemtap:"itemUpdate"},"button[itemId=removeAllCart]":{tap:"emptyCart"}},refs:{removeAllCartButton:"button[itemId=removeAllCart]"}},itemAdding:function(g,e,f,d,j){var h=j.event.target.type||"";if(h=="button"){var c=j.event.target.previousElementSibling;if(c.value<1){Ext.Msg.alert("Add Item","Please set the quantity !!")}else{var b=Ext.getStore("cartItems");var e=b.find("productType",d.get("productType"));if(e>=0){var d=b.getAt(e);var m=d.get("qty");console.log("previous qty = "+m+" new qty to be added "+c.value);var k=(parseInt(m)+parseInt(c.value));d.set("qty",k);var i=(k)*(d.get("price"));d.set("subtotal",i)}else{var i=(c.value*d.get("price"));b.add({productType:d.get("productType"),imageUrl:d.get("imageUrl"),price:d.get("price"),qty:c.value,subtotal:(c.value*d.get("price"))})}console.log("1");Constant.num+=parseInt(c.value);Constant.total+=i;var a=Ext.getCmp("ext-tabbar-1").down(".tab[title=Cart]");a.setBadgeText(Constant.num);var l=Ext.ComponentQuery.query("#totalAmount");console.log(l[0].getTitle());l[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$")}}},itemUpdate:function(f,d,e,c,j){var h=j.event.target.type||"";if(h=="button"){var b=j.event.target.previousElementSibling;var g=parseInt(c.get("qty"));c.set("qty",b.value);var k=c.get("subtotal");var i=(b.value)*(c.get("price"));c.set("subtotal",i);Constant.total+=(i-k);Constant.num+=(parseInt(b.value)-g);var a=Ext.getCmp("ext-tabbar-1").down(".tab[title=Cart]");a.setBadgeText(Constant.num);var l=Ext.ComponentQuery.query("#totalAmount");console.log(l[0].getTitle());l[0].setTitle("Total Amount : "+Constant.total+"$")}},emptyCart:function(){console.log("emptty cart");var a=Ext.getStore("cartItems");a.removeAll()

0.5em;border: #a6a6a6;"/>

'},{xtype:"titlebar",docked:"bottom",title:"Total Amount : "+Constant.total,itemId:"totalAmount",items:[{text:"Remove All",align:"left",itemId:"removeAllCart"},{text:"Proceed to Pay",align:"right"}]
